page.title: 12Employment In The Area
page.content: The majority of people in the area are employed in service industries 28%, manufacturing industries 26%, and agriculture 21%. The service industries include accountants, garages, builders and water board engineers. Many of those working in the manufacturing industry are employed by the chemical industry (I.C.I.), cable manufacturers (B.I.C.C.) and Shell Petroleum. Of those employed in agriculture, not all are farmers. Some are millers, gardeners and forestry workers. 17% are employed in national or local government which includes the health service, education, police and social services. 2% are traders and that includes people who sell in the markets.
